document.full_text: the cincinnati reds stretched their unbeaten start to the season to five games with a 12-4 blowout over the houston astros wednesday.
document.title: unbeaten reds crush error-prone astros 12-4
lines_and_colors: the cincinnati reds stretched their unbeaten start to the season to five games with a 12-4 blowout over the houston astros wednesday.
